title: Store not loading (blank screen)
body: Trying to buy Rakan and the store isnt showing up on my client. Its just the blue background. Tried changing settings on internet explorer and nothing has changed. HELP!

replies.body: Me too, no matter how long i wait, the league store appears blank. i tried all the given solutions, the general internet explorer settings and the connection guide as well... HALP!

If that store data still won't load after adjusting your IE settings, then there might be something blocking your network from being able to grab the data it needs to display. Check out the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to get that crazy bird-brain {{champion:497}}
